name: $linkId
desc: Returns: An identifier that is unique within the Questionnaire allowing linkage to the equivalent item in a QuestionnaireResponse resource.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An identifier that is unique within the Questionnaire allowing linkage to the equivalent item in a QuestionnaireResponse resource.

name: $definition
desc:
Returns: A reference to an [ElementDefinition](elementdefinition.html) that provides the details for the item. If a definition is provided, then the following element values can be inferred from the definition: 

* code (ElementDefinition.code)
* type (ElementDefinition.type)
* required (ElementDefinition.min)
* repeats (ElementDefinition.max)
* maxLength (ElementDefinition.maxLength)
* options (ElementDefinition.binding)

Any information provided in these elements on a Questionnaire Item overrides the information from the definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc:
A reference to an [ElementDefinition](elementdefinition.html) that provides the details for the item. If a definition is provided, then the following element values can be inferred from the definition: 

* code (ElementDefinition.code)
* type (ElementDefi

name: $code
desc: Returns: A terminology code that corresponds to this group or question (e.g. a code from LOINC, which defines many questions and answers).

name: $addcode
desc: A terminology code that corresponds to this group or question (e.g. a code from LOINC, which defines many questions and answers).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A terminology code that corresponds to this group or question (e.g. a code from LOINC, which defines many questions and answers).

name: $prefix
desc: Returns: A short label for a particular group, question or set of display text within the questionnaire used for reference by the individual completing the questionnaire.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short label for a particular group, question or set of display text within the questionnaire used for reference by the individual completing the questionnaire.

name: $text
desc: Returns: The name of a section, the text of a question or text content for a display item.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of a section, the text of a question or text content for a display item.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The type of questionnaire item this is - whether text for display, a grouping of other items or a particular type of data to be captured (string, integer, coded choice, etc.).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of questionnaire item this is - whether text for display, a grouping of other items or a particular type of data to be captured (string, integer, coded choice, etc.).

name: $enableWhen
desc: Returns: A constraint indicating that this item should only be enabled (displayed/allow answers to be captured) when the specified condition is true.

name: $addenableWhen
desc: A constraint indicating that this item should only be enabled (displayed/allow answers to be captured) when the specified condition is true.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A constraint indicating that this item should only be enabled (displayed/allow answers to be captured) when the specified condition is true.

name: $required
desc: Returns: An indication, if true, that the item must be present in a "completed" QuestionnaireResponse.  If false, the item may be skipped when answering the questionnaire.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An indication, if true, that the item must be present in a "completed" QuestionnaireResponse.  If false, the item may be skipped when answering the questionnaire.

name: $repeats
desc: Returns: An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups.

name: $readOnly
desc: Returns: An indication, when true, that the value cannot be changed by a human respondent to the Questionnaire.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An indication, when true, that the value cannot be changed by a human respondent to the Questionnaire.

name: $maxLength
desc: Returns: The maximum number of characters that are permitted in the answer to be considered a "valid" QuestionnaireResponse.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The maximum number of characters that are permitted in the answer to be considered a "valid" QuestionnaireResponse.

name: $options
desc: Returns: A reference to a value set containing a list of codes representing permitted answers for a "choice" or "open-choice" question.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to a value set containing a list of codes representing permitted answers for a "choice" or "open-choice" question.

name: $option
desc: Returns: One of the permitted answers for a "choice" or "open-choice" question.

name: $addoption
desc: One of the permitted answers for a "choice" or "open-choice" question.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: One of the permitted answers for a "choice" or "open-choice" question.
